title: Already Home
description: From New York Times bestselling author Vicki Lewis Thompson, a Sons of Chance series novella!Daredevil videographer Langford "Hutch" Hutchinson has put his career on hold to help his widowed father run their family store in Wyoming. He doesn't mean to stay in town for long--though it's long enough to rekindle his lust for Trina Bledstone. Hutch always had a thing for Trina, but she's his best friend's sister--and that meant hands off!But Trina still has the power to set his pulse racing--and her brother isn't around to stop them from exploring their sizzling chemistry this time....A Sons of Chance series novella.
author: Vicki Lewis Thompson
